summary.para: Contains functionality for working with paket.

In order to use the commands for this addin, you will need to include the following in your build.cake file:
#addin paket:?package=Cake.Paket

This assumes your using the Cake.Paket.Module. If you'd rather use NuGet then include:
#addin nuget:?package=Cake.Paket #tool nuget:?package=Paket

member.name: T:Cake.Paket.Addin.Restore.PaketRestoreSettings
member.summary: Contains settings used by . See Paket Restore for more details.

member.name: P:Cake.Paket.Addin.Restore.PaketRestoreSettings.FailOnChecks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to cause the restore to fail if any of the checks fail.

member.name: P:Cake.Paket.Addin.Restore.PaketRestoreSettings.Force
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to force the download of all packages.

member.name: P:Cake.Paket.Addin.Restore.PaketRestoreSettings.Group
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to restore a single group.

member.name: P:Cake.Paket.Addin.Restore.PaketRestoreSettings.IgnoreChecks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip the test if paket.dependencies and paket.lock are in sync.

member.name: P:Cake.Paket.Addin.Restore.PaketRestoreSettings.OnlyReferenced
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to restore packages that are referenced in the paket.references files, as opposed to all the packages in paket.dependencies.

member.name: P:Cake.Paket.Addin.Restore.PaketRestoreSettings.Project
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to restore dependencies for a project.

member.name: P:Cake.Paket.Addin.Restore.PaketRestoreSettings.ReferencesFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets value to restore all packages from the given paket.references files.

member.name: P:Cake.Paket.Addin.Restore.PaketRestoreSettings.TouchAffectedRefs
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to touch project files referencing packages which are being restored, to help incremental build tools detecting the change.
